content: Christopher V. Cosgriff is an internal medicine resident at the Hospital of the University of Pennsylvania. He is interested in critical care medicine, resuscitation science, epidemiology, causal inference, and machine learning. Previously focused on computational quantum chemistry, he enjoys building models for prediction and inference.
